### Version history

This page provides information about older or alternative versions of  indicative distribution map for this ecosystem functional group [**{{< meta params.efgname >}}**](/efg-info/MT1_2.qmd).
Check the current maps [here](/map-info/MT1_2_valid.qmd).

- Web navigation (**code: MT1.2.web.orig**, version v1.0) discarded 
 - Web navigation (**code: MT1.2.WM.nwx**, version v1.0) in preparation 
 - Indicative Map (**code: MT1.2.IM.orig**, version v0.2) discarded 

### Datasets

Datasets considered for previous versions of the indicative map

- **TidalFlats2019** (Murray NJ et al. 2019).

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset        |url                                                                                                               |
|:--------------|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|TidalFlats2019 |<https://data.unep-wcmc.org/datasets/47>{target='links'} :: <https://www.intertidal.app/download>{target='links'} |


:::
:::

### Available files

You can download geospatial data for older versions of these maps from the following sources:

**MT1.2.web.orig** (v1.0): [GitHub repository](https://github.com/red-list-ecosystem/typology-map-data/blob/master/data/layers/MT1.2.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json){target="gisdata"}

**MT1.2.IM.orig** (v0.2): [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.MT1_2_IM_orig){target="gisdata"}

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.

###  License information

Indicative maps have been released with a ![](https://zenodo.org/static/icons/licenses/cc-by-icon.svg){height=20} Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license. 

But see details of dataset licenses below:

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset        |license_info                                                                                           |
|:--------------|:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|TidalFlats2019 |Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License :: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ |


:::
:::

## References

References used in these versions of the maps.

- Murray NJ, Phinn SR, DeWitt M, Ferrari R, Johnston R, Lyons MB, Clinton N, Thau D, Fuller RA  (2019) *The global distribution and trajectory of tidal flats* **Nature** 565: 222â€“225 [DOI:10.1038/s41586-018-0805-8](http:dx.doi.org/10.1038/s41586-018-0805-8)
